statements: SELECT * FROM cases
SELECT case_name, deadline FROM cases
SELECT case_id, case_name, deadline FROM cases WHERE client_id = 1
SELECT case_name, deadline FROM cases ORDER BY deadline DESC
SELECT case_name, client_id FROM cases WHERE case_id = 100
SELECT * FROM cases WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT case_name, deadline FROM cases WHERE client_id = 100 ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT case_name FROM cases WHERE deadline >= '2022-01-01' AND client_id IN (100, 200);
SELECT case_name, client_id FROM cases WHERE case_id IN (5, 10, 15) AND deadline < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY client_id ASC, case_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM cases WHERE deadline BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM cases;
SELECT case_name, deadline FROM cases WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 5;
SELECT case_id, case_details FROM cases WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT client_id, client_phone FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM cases WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients WHERE client_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_details FROM cases WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT client_name, client_email, client_phone FROM clients ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM cases INNER JOIN clients ON cases.client_id = clients.client_id;
SELECT * FROM case_details;
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM case_details WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT case_id, case_name, client_id FROM case_details WHERE client_id = 123;
SELECT client_name, email FROM client_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM deadlines ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM case_details WHERE client_id = 1 ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT case_name, deadline_date FROM case_details JOIN deadlines ON case_details.case_id = deadlines.case_id WHERE deadlines.deadline_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM client_information WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM case_details WHERE deadline < '2022-11-15' ORDER BY case_name ASC;
SELECT client_name, case_name, deadline FROM client_information JOIN case_details ON client_information.client_id = case_details.client_id WHERE case_details.case_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM cases;
SELECT id, case_number, client_id FROM cases ORDER BY case_number DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM clients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM lawyers WHERE specialization = 'Criminal Law';
SELECT id, name, location FROM law_firms ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM cases WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, case_number, deadline FROM cases ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM clients WHERE email IS NOT NULL;

SELECT c.name as client_name, l.name as lawyer_name, lf.name as law_firm_name FROM clients c JOIN cases cs ON c.id = cs.client_id JOIN lawyers l ON cs.client_id = l.id JOIN law_firms lf ON l.law_firm_id = lf.id;
SELECT * FROM cases WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM case_details WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT case_name, deadline FROM case_details WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT client_name, client_phone FROM client_information WHERE client_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT member_name, member_position FROM firm_members ORDER BY member_position;
SELECT assignment_id, case_id, assigned_member_id, assigned_date FROM case_assignments WHERE completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM case_details WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT case_name, deadline FROM case_details WHERE deadline <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT client_name, client_phone FROM client_information WHERE client_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT member_name, member_position FROM firm_members ORDER BY member_position DESC;
SELECT c.case_name, cd.deadline_date, cd.reminder_sent FROM case_details c JOIN case_deadlines cd ON c.case_id = cd.case_id;
